title: Photoshop Elements 2024 offers subscription-free access to Adobe AI tech
description: Photoshop Elements is receiving several new features like Artistic Effect, which uses special filters based on famous artists.

title: Don’t mistake that 1TB SSD for a snack — smallest ever solid state drive that's barely bigger than a thumbnail debuts in the Far East
description: Buffalo’s 1TB SSD measures just 14.6 x 28 x 8mm and weighs under 5g.

title: Scammers are targeting plastic surgery clinics with extortion scams
description: Plastic surgeons and their patients are having their sensitive data - including intimate photos - taken.

title: WhatsApp is testing a new self-destructing voice messages feature
description: WhatsApp's latest security beta also prevents people from saving or sharing the temporary messages with others.

title: Patch WinRAR now - it's got a major security flaw
description: Chinese and Russians criminals are using WinRAR to target victims and deliver infostealers, so patch now.

title: Samsung just made getting your Galaxy devices repaired super-easy
description: Samsung and Batteries Plus will now repair Galaxy devices under warranty and do it on the same day.

title: Don’t spend big on iPhone 15 storage – get this cheap USB-C drive instead
description: Western Digital's latest USB-C drive lets you easily expand your iPhone 15 storage on-the-go.

title: Halo Infinite season 5 introduces the best Forge update yet
description: Halo Infinite has seen a big boost in players following the release of Season 5: Reckoning.

title: Google just took a major step up in keeping you safe from dodgy Android apps
description: Android Play Protect is getting a big safety upgrade, Google confirmed.

title: Nvidia could release a speedy new RTX 4070 Super that makes the RTX 4080 GPU irrelevant
description: Can Nvidia cancel the ailing RTX 4080? No, but a speedy new RTX 4070 Super may be a way of sort of semi-retiring the 4080.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 will receive a New Game Plus mode but it won't come with the day-one patch
description: Insomniac Games has confirmed that Marvel's Spider-Man 2 will recieve New Game Plus post-launch.

title: The OnePlus Open has landed, with better specs and a lower price than rival foldables
description: The OnePlus Open has a super-bright screen, promising cameras, and a competitive price.

title: North Korea has got its hands on AI - and is testing its ability to commit cyberwarfare
description: US official confirms AI is being tested by North Korea to enhance its cyber attacks.

title: Tesla Cybertruck finally gets delivery date but Musk wants to 'temper expectations'
description: Elon Musk reveals the first delivery dates for his upcoming Cybertruck but wants customers and shareholders to "temper expectations"

title: Make drinks for magical creatures in this cozy Coffee Talk and D&D-inspired visual novel
description: Gentle Giant Entertainment has revealed its brand-new visual novel Tavern Talk.

title: Most firms think AI is a threat to security - but they still use it
description: Bitwarden survey finds while AI is a concern, securing it has some catching up to do.

title: DJI Pocket 3 teaser reveals video camera's likely launch date amid new leaks
description: A new DJI teaser suggests that its rumored Pocket 3 vlogging camera is close to a full launch.

title: Not sure whether you want a USB-C, Lightning or wireless DAC? This one's all three
description: Astell & Kern’s HB1 USB-C/Lightning DAC comes with all the cables but can also level up your sound wirelessly.

title: The Encryption Summit: all the news and updates as they happen
description: A virtual event to shed light on the power of encryption and the regulatory challenges is currently facing. Follow TechRadar live blog for all the latest updates on GED2023.

title: Millions more 23andMe records leaked online

title: Netflix is getting a new animated musical from the legendary composer of Aladdin, The Little Mermaid, and Beauty and the Beast
description: Skydance Animation's movies and shows are leaving Apple and coming to Netflix, with new movies from 2024 onwards.

title: Oh, hello Threadripper Pro 7995WX — AMD launches world’s fastest desktop CPU ever but things are about to get very, very confusing for power users
description: Professionals and creatives can now choose between Ryzen, Ryzen Threadripper, Ryzen Threadripper Pro and Epyc.

title: The AMD Radeon RX 7900M is here to challenge Nvidia's laptop GPU dominance
description: The AMD Radeon RX 7900M was launched this week in partnership with Alienware, whose Alienware m18 AMD Advantage laptop is the exclusive home for this new hardware.

title: The US government will let you use facial recognition to access services online - but don't worry, your data is safe
description: GSA is introducing new methods of secure access to its Login.gov services.

title: Garmin is reportedly working on a glut of new features and two new smartwatches
description: Garmin's new Focus feature is said to change the way its app looks - but it’s just one of many new features reportedly on the way.

title: Tekken 8 fans can get early access to the closed beta if they're a Virgin Media O2 customer
description: Virgin Media is giving O2 customers early access to Tekken 8's closed beta on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam.

title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 + 2 gets offline support on Steam Deck, but not PC
description: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 players on Steam Deck can now play offline.

title: Make sure that email from HR is legit - it could be another phishing scam
description: HR topics, such as dress codes and vacation dates, are super popular among hackers engaged in phishing.

title: Seagate is releasing new SSD custom-made for gaming handhelds and Microsoft Surface devices
description: Seagate is launching a new SSD called the FireCuda 520N NVMe, which is made for gaming handhelds as well as Surface devices.

title: iOS 17.1 is coming soon – here are the 4 biggest updates coming to your iPhone
description: iOS 17.1 is unlikely to completely change your world, but there are some interesting new features to make use of.

title: Report claims Apple may launch a foldable iPad in 2024, but doubts remain
description: Apple might launch a folding iPad next year, says a new report, which claims production could start soon.

title: Amazon just made its warehouse robots a whole lot quicker, and even smarter
description: Robotics deployed across Amazon warehouses are improving productivity, but jobs look to be safe for now.

title: There might soon be a fix for the Apple Watch 9 and Ultra 2's annoying display bug
description: Apple should hopefully be releasing a watchOS update to fixed the Apple Watch 9 and Ultra 2's flickering display issue.

title: Former Assassin's Creed lead producer thinks AI in game development is inevitable
description: Haven Studios' head and Everquest 2's co-director think AI in game development will happen no matter what the public opinion is.

title: GoDaddy and Google team up to make sure you never miss a business email
description: More of your business messages can be viewed and responded to directly from GoDaddy’s tool.

description: Sam Lake has explained what was going through his mind when he produced his iconic squinting face for Max Payne.

title: Microsoft Teams is adding a private line for your super secret calls
description: Super-secure Microsoft Teams calls can be a reality with new Private Line tools.

title: Is tech debt holding back your business?
description: It can be a daunting blunder to correct, but addressing technical debt could save you money and fuel growth.

title: The final straw? Netflix is hiking prices again despite massive success from its password crackdown
description: Netflix is making tons of money: profits are up and subscriptions are doing bigger numbers than expected. And now it'd like to make some more.

title: Peanut Butter the dog will speedrun a Nintendo classic at AGDQ 2024
description: Intrepid canine Peanut Butter will attempt a run of old-school Nintendo puzzler Gyromite at the upcoming AGDQ speedrunning event.

title: The Oppo Find N3 is here, and might have spoiled the OnePlus Open’s launch
description: The Oppo Find N3 has landed, and it might be the OnePlus Open in all but name.

title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder scrapped a “tsundere commentary” feature that was popular during playtesting
description: Super Mario Bros. Wonder included a "live commentary" feature during development that had a tsundere option, but it was scrapped.

title: Lords of the Fallen gets "substantial performance improvements" thanks to the latest patch

title: Overwatch 2 is getting its first musical collab with K-pop girl group LE SSERAFIM
description: LE SSERAFIM is making a guest appearance at BlizzCon for Overwatch 2's first-ever musical collaboration.

title: Nokia is slashing 14,000 jobs after sales plummet
description: €700 million in savings over two years could help Nokia to protect itself against the future, but at the cost of thousands of jobs.

title: Servers for online shooter Second Extinction will shut down next year
description: It has been announced that servers for online co-op dino shooter Second Extinction will shut down next year.

title: Final's latest gaming earbuds are tailor-made for VR
description: The Final VR2000 earbuds are available now and designed with VR players in mind.

title: Apple AirTag 2 could be delayed until 2025 and it might be the Vision Pro's fault
description: It's unknown why the AirTag 2 is being delayed, but it could be because Apple is trying to integrate it with the Vision Pro.

title: AI has helped read a 2000-year-old scroll consumed by volcanic ash — and this could help rewrite what we know of antiquity
description: The scroll, from the ancient Roman city Herculaneum, contained Greek letters on several lines of the papyrus.
